text: The 1958 FIFA World Cup Final took place in Råsunda Stadium, Solna (near Stockholm), Sweden on 29 June 1958 to determine the champion of the 1958 FIFA World Cup. ==Details== {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" GK 3 Gilmar RB 4 Djalma Santos CB 15 Orlando CB 2 Hideraldo Bellini (c) LB 12 Nílton Santos RH 19 Zito LH 6 Didi OR 11 Garrincha OL 7 Mário Zagallo CF 20 Vavá CF 10 Pelé Manager: Vicente Feola Officials *Linesmen: **Albert Dusch (Germany) **Juan Gardeazabal (Spain) |} Match Rules *90 minutes *30 minutes of extra-time if necessary *Replay if necessary *No substitutions permitted ==Match statistics== ==Related pages== * Pelé: Birth of a Legend ==References== ==Other websites== * 1958 FIFA World Cup on FIFA.com Category:FIFA World Cup finals Final Category:20th century in Sweden Category:1958 in Europe
title: 1958 FIFA World Cup Final
